page.title: 07Manor Farm, Wentworth
page.content: {Manor Farm}is made up of{150 acres}and lies in the middle of Wentworth off {Main Street}opposite the public house called the George and Dragon.{Mr. {Woodcock}is 40 years old and has been farming this farm for 22 years.His family has owned{Manor Farm}since {1899.}Mr,Woodcock is a tena nt and pays Â£100 per week .Mr, Woodcock has two different types of cows they are {Hereford}cows and{Friesian}Bulls.He buys them when they are 3/4 months old.He raises them for about 1 and a half years and then takes them to be slaughtered.He buys them at {Penistone}auction,and uses them for {beef.}Mr.Woodcock has got 2 guard dogs and 3 cats.The farmer Mr.Woodcock builds his own barns,and sometimes barn owls nest in them. I think Mr.Woodcock is a very busy man! I am writing this in{1985.
